Notes.Text: IPython was updated to fix a cross-site-scripting vulnerability in handling local foldernames. (CVE-2015-6938, bnc#945828)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Vulnerabilities.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the file browser in notebook/notebookapp.py in IPython Notebook before 3.2.2 and Jupyter Notebook 4.0.x before 4.0.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a folder name.  NOTE: this was originally reported as a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, but this may be inaccurate.
